content: below and working the new stitches created by yo s into the seed stitch pattern by looking ahead to the next stitches and then working them accordingly rs k2 yo seed stitch to centre stitch yo k1 yo seed stitch to last 2 stitches yo k2 repeat these two row for as many row as you like or until you have just enough yarn left for the cast-off row then cast off in seed stitch no yo s in this row i worked the cast off on the ws weave in any ends if you have any questions or comments please do not hesitate to contact me on ravelry or via my blog stitchnerd blogspot com your feedback is greatly appreciated please don t forget to link to the pattern on ravelry nonaofsav © susan ashcroft - for personal non-commercial use only page 4 darkmoon knittycroc googoo sheknitstoo camilliaknits texgal andanteknitter chileblanco jj1216 christinacoghill debsf love2read lillkitten anachrotech © susan ashcroft - for personal non-commercial use only page 5
